name: DreamKitchen
sidebar: I worked as part of a team to develop the DreamKitchen website, which bridges restaurants and recipes.  The project allowed me to work on a team developing a full stack website, including a SQL database deployed through Heroku.com.

name: ArtMapper
sidebar: I worked as part of a team to develop the ArtMapper website, which involves use of APIs.  The project also allowed us the chance to work on a team and develop good teaming practices, as well documentation and project management skills.

name: Project 3
sidebar: This project will be available in April, 2021.

name: Mjoc's Weather Dashboard
sidebar: Working independently, I was able to put together a Weather Dashboard, that I can use to check the weather in over 200 cities around the world, as well as giving me skills in accessing APIs and working with site specific protocols.

name: Mjoc's Password Generator
sidebar: I also built a useful password generator. That was an early effort in the use of JAVAScript.

name: CodeQuiz
sidebar: This assignment required us to build an interactive game quiz that was time limited.
